creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque with large, hollow, cylinder neck ring; neck ring has curlicues on both ends; neck ring is attached to the crescent-shaped plaque; plaque has a building at center with deer-like animal below it, and a dragon on either side of the temple; background of floral and tiny dots; 13 chime-like cones hang down from the plaque
title: Torque
